activities: We transmit and securely store board materials for EU and Swiss companies electronically.  In the event that a client calls customer service, we need to be able to identify them and call them back.  For that reason we store the names, phone numbers and email addresses of the clients who will be using the software.
contacttitle1: Associate General Counsel and Assistant Corporate Secretary
